pageContent: This is my web designer with me. His name is Jamel.

I saved. I saved. Tom hopkins $50,000,000.01 day. He came to me and he had what they call a luncheon session during the seminar. And he said, Would you come and sit with me? I got to ask you something. He said, I know youre a minister. And he says, My wife is getting ready to divorce me. And I said, Tom, because he was worth $100 million at that time, thats $50 million out of your pocket. And he says, yeah, I dont know what to do. He says, Im confused. Im bewildered, obviously, Im not doing things right, apparently. I says, well, your wife should be and your family should be before even the business. And I said, Listen, what have you taught us? And he said, Well, I really dont know. You always taught us, get back to the basics. Get back to the basics. Get back to the basics. And I said, thats all you need to do with your wife is get back to the basics. Remember when you first met her? You were google eyed. You wrote her notes. You brought her flowers and candy. I said, thats all you got to do again. And shell remember all that and itll come flooding into her brain and shell have endorphins and shell be all giddy again. And he says, Im going to do it. Im going to do it. He went home and he did just what I told him to do. And I saved him $50 million that day. Now, I didnt get a reward for it, but my reward was even greater because I taught the teacher.
And I have all of the material, so Im not worried about gathering up material for you all.

Yeah.
